Ratings.comment: I have immense rage for this class. Why on EARTH is there so much homework. There was sometimes TWO QUIZZES plus more homework and doing the quizzes would take forever. I would do ANYTHING but take this class again. Why is there more homework in this class than classes for my major. Don't take this class unless you want to go through torture

I took CSFRST 2374 for my history gened req and I dont regret it. Took me a while to get into the swing of things, but then I excelled in the course. Trina is very helpful, easily accessible and organizes her course very clearly. She seemed to love what the course had to offer and I did too!
